name: Jar Battlers
description: Jar Battlers located in a toriyama-ish retro style pixelated world, where you have to get rid of your opponents using jars, bombs and more, in the numerous arenas of this crazy tournament!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Pentium 4 or Higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 60 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Pentium 4 or Higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 60 MB available space Sound Card: Any
